name: Skin Skishers
description:
A Seemingly Pointless local multiplayer game by

@Just404it & @JoeCawks

Featuring music by GroundisLava

🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥

Many years ago the sun left the earth, and we shed our human skin. However, we did not understand that the sun would merge with other suns to form a single, mega-sun. And that it would come back.

Now the world is nearly without old skin. And the mega-sun is getting much hotter these days. The ultra-UV rays are turning our muscles into liquid and our bleached-bones into dust. We must reclaim abandoned skin husks to protect ourselves before it is too late.

🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥 🔥
